nodes.text: Darth Zhorrid, a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire, owned an estate on the planet Begeren. Between receiving tasks from her father Darth Jadus, Zhorrid returned to her estates on Begeren as well as the planets Sernpidal and Dromund Kaas, where she spent her free time indulging in a variety of luxuries and horrors.
Darth Zhorrid's estates were first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Sith Lord in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
